title: Issue with login authentication
text: Users unable to login after recent deployment
Description: Multiple users reported inability to login after the latest deployment. Error 500 occurring.

title: Clone: Login authentication issue
text: Clone of ENT-22970 for portal team investigation
Description: Portal team investigation of authentication failures reported in ENT-22970

title: Security review for authentication system
text: Conduct security audit of login system
Description: Conducting security review of the authentication system following recent failures.

title: Optimize database queries for login
Description: Optimize database queries in the login flow to improve performance during peak hours.

title: Improve login page UX
Description: Enhance user experience on the login page with better error messages and loading states.

title: Load balancer configuration for auth service
Description: Configure load balancer for the authentication service to improve reliability.

title: New API endpoint for password reset
Description: Create new API endpoint for password reset functionality with rate limiting.

title: Integration tests for auth system
Description: Implement comprehensive integration tests for the authentication system.

title: Add monitoring for auth failures
Description: Set up monitoring and alerts for authentication failures and unusual patterns.

title: Update authentication documentation
Description: Update technical documentation for authentication system including new security measures.

title: Implement SSO integration
Description: Integrate Single Sign-On (SSO) functionality with existing auth system.

title: Mobile app authentication issues
Description: Investigate and fix authentication issues specific to mobile app users.

title: Implement MFA support
Description: Add support for Multi-Factor Authentication to enhance security.

title: Redesign login flow
Description: Implement new design for login flow with improved user experience.

title: Cache optimization for auth service
Description: Implement caching improvements for authentication service performance.
